participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ddis_scr_script_elaptme.Description: Time it took to run script (in ms)

ddis_scr_computer_platform.Description: The platform the script was run on

ddis_scr_values_completed.Description: 0 = script was not completed (prematurely aborted); 1 = script was completed (all conditions run)

ddis_scr_val_testdelays.Description: A string variable that stores all tested

ddis_scr_val_immedcho.Description: values.immediateChoiceValidity. (Added in June 2018) Tally of immediate choices in the three validity questions presented after the "3months", "1year", and "5years" delay  blocks (e.g. "get $100 NOW" vs. "get $100 in 5 years"). Values < 3 indicate some inattentive (or at least irrational) behavior by the participant

ddis_scr_val_indif_point_6h.Description: 6-hour delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait 6 h to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_1da.Description: 1-day delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait one day to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_1week.Description: 1-week delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait 1 week to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_1mth.Description: 1 month delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait one month to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_3mth.Description: 3 month delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait three months to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_1yr.Description: 1 year delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait one year to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_val_indif_pnt_5yr.Description: 5-year delay "indifference point"; The proportion of the maximum ($100) reward that, if presented immediately, was equal in subjective value to the maximum ($100) reward if the subject had to wait five years to receive the maximum.

ddis_scr_expr_mnrt_allcho.Description: expressions.meanRT_allChoices: mean latency (in ms) of all choices

ddis_scr_expr_medrt_allcho.Description: medianRT_allChoices:  median latency (in ms) of all choices

ddis_scr_expr_mnrt_immcho.Description: meanRT_immedChoices:  mean latency (in ms) of	'immediate' choices

ddis_scr_expr_medrt_immedcho.Description: medianRT_immedChoices:	 median latency (in ms) of 'immediate' choices

ddis_scr_expr_mnrt_delaycho.Description: meanRT_delayedChoices: mean latency (in ms) of 'delayed' choices

ddis_scr_expr_medrt_delaycho.Description: medianRT_delayedChoices: median latency (in ms) of 'delayed' choices
